headline: VICI Properties Inc. (VICI): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on VICI Properties Inc. on The Financial Pen’s Substack. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on VICI. VICI Properties Inc.’s share was trading at $33.11 as of August 1st. VICI’s trailing and forward P/E were 12.69 and 11.78, respectively according to Yahoo Finance.
